ygData.subject: RE: Corpse Recoveries
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes it works.  I sent in a bug report on this way back in beta p4 as a possible exploit.  I guess Verant is ok with self-consenting. Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana
ygData.messageBody:
Yes it works. I sent in a bug report on this way back in beta p4 as a
possible exploit. I guess Verant is ok with self-consenting.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti

>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
> > your main character at further risk. Simply create a level 1
> > character, login with the main character and /consent to the
> > level 1 character, then login with the level 1 character and
> > go looking for the corpse. (This assumes of course that the
>
>I've long wondered if you could give consent to a player
>that is not online.. Have you personally done this to
>verify that it works? Seems to me that Verant would look
>at this as some kind of exploit. Although personally I'm
>glad if it works as there are times that through no fault
>of your own, you're in a spot that your character will never
>get it's corpse from.
